    • compareByQvalue

      public static int compareByQvalue(String m1, String m2)
      Compare two mime types by Quality
      Parameters:
      m1 - First Mime Type
      m2 - Second Mime Type
      Returns:
      The comparison result

    • getHeaders

      public static org.springframework.http.HttpHeaders getHeaders(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
      This enables content negotiation for the ModernizationController
      Parameters:
      req - The HttpServletRequest used to determine acceptable content types
      Returns:
      An HttpHeaders with the Content-Type header set appropriately.

    • guessMediaType

      public static org.springframework.http.MediaType guessMediaType(InputStream inputStream) throws IOException
      Guess the media type of an input stream and return it.
      Parameters:
      inputStream - The input stream (must be a buffered input stream to address the issue of read-ahead.
      Returns:
      The best guess at the media type for this resource.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an IO Error occurs.

    • selectParser

      public static ca.uhn.fhir.parser.IParser selectParser(org.springframework.http.MediaType mediaType)
      Given a media type, return the appropriate parser for reading and generating it
      Parameters:
      mediaType - The media type
      Returns:
      A parser for reading and generating FHIR from th specified media type
